sentences.en: Believe Satan says the same at the gates of hell, old - timer!
sentences.cn: 相信撒旦在地狱之门也说同样的话, 老顽固!

sentences.en: Gabrielle entered this year's charts faster than any first-timer before her.
sentences.cn: 加布丽埃勒上榜的速度比之前所有初次上榜歌手都要快。

sentences.en: No old - timer will touch us.
sentences.cn: 我从来不吃老派那一套.

sentences.en: One way to throttle a process it to use a timer.
sentences.cn: 限制进程的一种方法是使用计时器.
让厨房计时器开始计时。

sentences.en: Set the timer on the cooker for three minutes.
sentences.cn: 把炉子上的定时器设定为三分钟。

sentences.en: Sleep Timer Emulates the time found in most TVs.
sentences.cn: 睡眠计时器模拟时发现,大多数电视.

sentences.en: That's a timer, and it's counting down!
sentences.cn: 那是个计时器, 已经开始倒计时了!

sentences.en: The little bell of the timer on the stove took up a show - spaced pinging.
sentences.cn: 炉灶上计时器的小铃发出了一阵不急不徐的铃铃声.

sentences.en: The oven has an automatic timer and other refinements.
sentences.cn: 这个烤箱有自动定时器及其他改进装置.

sentences.en: The sampling system is controlled by an adjustable program timer or by a manual pushbutton.
sentences.cn: 取样系统用可调程序定时器或手动操作的按纽控制.

sentences.en: The solid - state controller has an electronic timer which provides an extremely short time base.
sentences.cn: 在固定调节器中,有一只电子定时器,它能提供极小的定时常数.

sentences.en: The speed can be controlled by regulation of timer.
sentences.cn: 用定时器调节,控制速度.

sentences.en: The timer must have been actuated by radio control.
sentences.cn: 这个定时器肯定是无线电操纵开动的.

sentences.en: Well, I think I'm a real full - time full - timer.
sentences.cn: 那, 我想我真是个不折不扣的 全天候 全职工作者.

words.tran_cn: 永恒的；不受时间影响的；不合时宜的
时间；时代；次数；节拍；倍数
计时员；钟表；工作时间记录员
永恒，不朽；不受时间影响
合拍；为…安排时间；记录…的时间（time的过去分词）
为…安排时间；测定…的时间（time的ing形式）
计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
[电子]定时器；计时器；计时员，记时员；跑表；延时调节器

trans.tran_cn: 定时器，计时器，点火调节装置，跑表，时计
trans.tran_en: an instrument that you use to measure time, when you are doing something such as cooking
